0.1.name: wordpress/gravity-forms-popup-widget
0.1.description:
A widget to add Gravity Form in dialog popup, has an option to add a delay, a position, and an introduction page.

From version 0.3 can be opted in/out to work ont he homepage. From version 0.5 you can use a button to open the popup. From version 0.6, added an option to show the popup only ones in X views (random generated) - Requested by .

Under the hood:

  • Built on Gravity Form 1.5.2, and uses it for working.
  • jQuery UI added from Wordpress itself
  • Uses jQueryUI CSS

Enjoy using Gravity Form Popup Widget? Please consider making a small donation to support the software’s continued development.
